titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that clinical social worker services are a mandatory benefit under the medicaid program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require States to cover clinical social worker services under the Medicaid program.
